answers.answer: Sory you lost your sister.  As you know having diabetes is not a death sentence.  controling your BG will help keep you alive and with all your body parts attached.How where you controlling your diabetes when it worked?perhaps eating less carbohydrates (they raise BG)  more exercise.if not on meds might be time to start.

question: Hi, My name is Donna and I have type 2 diabetes. My sister died Aug. 25 at the age of 56 from this disease. I had my under control until Thanksgiving and I now can not get under 200. What can I do?
title: new to community
